name: Engage.ly
overview:
Engage.ly helps brands and businesses deliver marketing notifications, such as, coupon codes, discounts and loyalty programs, via geo-targeted social networking campaigns.

Most social media tools today are focused on the online aspect of social networking. Engage.ly focuses on the hyper-local and geo-social aspects of marketing.

Because Engage.ly targets customers by BOTH geographic location and consumer interest, businesses can offer the person standing outside their store a â€œ10% Off Coupon Code.â€ Businesses can create campaigns to target social network users across large geographic regions, or, within a local neighborhood, down to one’s own block.

The software allows users to monitor and listen, and then, automatically and pro-actively engage in conversationâ€™s that matter. The goal is to help businesses filter out the “noise” of social networks and reach out to prospective customers that meet an organization’s marketing criteria for value.

There are safeguards built into the software that prevent users from contacting prospective repeatedly. This allows businesses to set up campaigns and let them run without constant intervention.
